source:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv('/Users/wombat/Desktop/課程筆記/政治與資訊/教學資料/CSV 資料集/10802_2020_tclw.csv')  
people= df.groupby("Page_Name")
df["Page_Name"] = df["Page_Name"].str.replace("三民惟新 陳柏惟","3Q 陳柏惟")
p1 = people.get_group("3Q 陳柏惟")['Share_Count'].agg('sum')
p2 = people.get_group("顏寬恒")['Share_Count'].agg('sum')
peopledata = {'Name':['3Q 陳柏惟','顏寬恒'], 'Share':[p1, p2]}
sharedata = pd.DataFrame(peopledata)
sharedata
